artist: Engraver: Jacque-Phillippe Le Bas; Painter: After David Teniers, the Younger; Publisher: Etienne Léon Poignant
description: chemist seated holding book in right hand a looking at flask in left hand; man standing beside him; woman at door; apprentices at right
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate below image in black: [D. Teniers pinx   La Bas Sculp/ Curé du Cabinet de Mr le Brun/ à Paris chez l\'Auteur rue du Gros Chenet No.47  et chez Poignant rue st Hotel Serpente]; on sheet in pencil below image: [1-87]
title: Curé du Cabinet de Mr le Brun
